format-storage-layer-on-error.help: Whether to format the storage layer when it cannot be read - always disable for production devices!

use-button.help: Whether the target has a button

button-pressed-state.help: Value of the button when pressed

no_led.help: This flag disables the heartbeat thread in tests. This is useful for platforms that don't have an LED or the LED is used for other functionality like LED on the SPI clockline etc

tests-fs-size.help: Maximum size of the file system used for tests
